roleset.name: exclude, except
roleset.note: EXCLUDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'exclude' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls admit-65. No comparison.(from exclude.01-v)
EXCLUSION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040.Comparison to 'exclude.01'. Vn class admit-65. Framed by Katie.(from exclusion.01-n)
EXCLUSIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an aliasfile for unification.(from exclusive.01-j)

example.name: exclude-v: discourse function, with (empty) arg0
example.text: *trace* Excluding one-time additions to profit in each year, earnings per share were $2.47, up 7.4% from $2.30 in fiscal 1988.
example.arg: one-time additions to profit in each year

example.name: exclude-v: discourse function, no arg0
example.text: Still, the combined profit of Ford, Chrysler Corp. and General Motors Corp. fell 44% to $1.02 billion from $1.83 billion a yearearlier, excluding a one-time gain of $309 million at Chrysler fromthe sale of Mitsubishi Motors Corp. stock.
example.arg: a one-time gain of $309 million at Chrysler from the sale of Mitsubishi Motors Corp. stock

example.name: exclude-v: real verbal, transitive
example.text: The figures exclude businesses now organized as American Express Information Services Co.
example.arg: businesses now organized as American Express Information Services Co

example.name: exclude-v: with excluded-from
example.text: The federal appeals court held that the nominal damages and the failure to prove all claims didn't exclude the USFL from beingreimbursed.
example.arg: the nominal damages and the failure to prove all claims

example.name: exclusion-n: Args 1 and 2
example.text: the exclusion of the company 's British sales from the current year 's figures

example.name: exclusion-n: args 1 and 2 again
example.text: the exclusion from elections of those charged with but not yet convicted of the relevant offences
example.arg: of those charged with but not yet convicted of the relevant offences

example.name: exclusion-n: All args
example.text: His exclusion of his sister from the wedding pary caused considerable family discord.

example.name: exclusive-j: mutually exclusive
example.text: In fact , commodity housing market and government - regulated market are to a large extent , not mutually exclusive .
example.arg: commodity housing market and government - regulated market

example.name: exclusive-j: args 0, 1
example.text: Our room rate was exclusive of breakfast

roleset.name: snobbish, reserved for a select elite group
roleset.note: EXCLUSIVE-J NOTES: Split off from original 'exclusive-j' roleset by Julia for unification.

example.name: exclusive-j
example.text: The infinity pool was exclusive for guests who booked a room for overnight stay so the pool isn't overcrowded and you would havea little privacy (although, there were occasional sneaks from"day-users" using the infinity pool).
example.arg: for guests who booked a room for overnight stay
so the pool isn't overcrowded and you would have a little privacy (although, there were occasional sneaks from"day-users" using the infinity pool)
